trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> for the sizing bar of a taskbar that is docked on the left side of the screen.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Taskbar.SizingBarLeft.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Taskbar.SizingBarLeft> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the sizing bar of a taskbar that is docked on the left side of the screen.
Gets a visual style element that represents the sizing bar for a taskbar that is docked on the left side of the screen.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Taskbar.SizingBarLeft.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the sizing bar for a taskbar that is docked on the left side of the screen.
